text: I absolutely love Koli Pain Relief Plaster! It gives a variably minty cool / soothing warm sensation depending on my body state, which I’ve never experienced with other brands. I always feel a whole lot better pasting Koli overnight to sleep. I use the orange muscle injury after an intense workout session and the classic red for lower back pain after a long day in the office. It’s a good gift from Singapore to get from the airport and it comes in beautifully designed boxes. Highly recommended!

The best pain relief plaster I've ever used. I also use their KOLI Super Warm massage roller before gym and during cool down at home I will use their KOLI Super Cool massage roller. Plaster use before bed time! Power combi!!
I love their products! Very effective for relieving my aches and pains! The packaging is very quirky and cool! Awesome!
Bought for my mother in law and she said is the best koyo she ever used so far in the past 15 years.
